title: Need my account unbanned
body: A while ago my I took a break from league of legends and I come back and my account was perma banned and ive tried to send riot a ticket but there was no response and I put so much money into that account and I beg riot for an unban pls

replies.body: It doesn't look like this account is banned, but if you reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) we'll be able to go over everything about your other account that's banned in that ticket.
I cant find the tickets in my email theyre so old should I get another?
Yea go ahead and shoot us another [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if ya need too.
